item.title: PHP 插件安装
item.description: redis 插件 bash wget http://pecl.php.net/get/redis-4.2.0.tgz tar xzf redis-4.2.0.tgz cd redis-4.2.0 /usr/local/php/bin/phpize ./configure --with-php-config=/usr/local/php/bin/php-config make && make install cat > /etc/php/conf.d/redis.ini << EOF [redis] extension=redis.so EOF RabbitMQ 插件安装 rabbitmq-c bash wget -O rabbitmq-c-0.9.0.tar.gz https://github.com/alanxz/rabbitmq-c/archive/v0.9.0.tar.gz tar xzf rabbitmq-c-0.9.0.tar.gz cd rabbitmq-c-0.9.0 mkdir build && cd build cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr/local/rabbitmq-c .. cmake --build . --target install 到这里就已经安装完成了。不过这
